features: Hydrate with a burst of freshness with this tea tree mint scalp shampoo Blended with peppermint & tea tree oil, the moisturizing shampoo invigorates the senses with a refreshing tingle on the scalp
HYDRATE, MOISTURIZE and REFRESH: This 25.4-fluid ounce bottle of OGX Hydrating + Tea Tree Mint Shampoo helps nourish and balance hair while leaving it feeling moisturized and soft
STIMULATE THE SENSES: Designed to invigorate and leave hair feeling strong, the nourishing mint shampoo also deeply washes hair for a deliciously fresh and long-lasting clean

HAIR CARE INSPIRED BY NATURE: Blended with Australian tea tree oil, which helps invigorate the scalp for a healthy look and feel as well as milk protein to help smooth and strengthen hair and peppermint oil for a refreshing tingle on the scalp

IRRESISTIBLY DELICIOUS SCENT: The sweet peppermint, iced vanilla and tea tree scent leaves locks with an irresistibly good smell with every wash Plus the sulfate-free surfactant hair care system is paraben-free and gentle on your tresses
body.description: Repair and soften thick hair with OGX Extra Strength Damage Remedy + Coconut Miracle Oil Penetrating Hair Oil Treatment. Ideal for medium to coarse-textures, medium to dry hydration levels, and medium to high volume hair types, the hydrating oil treatment penetrates each strand to help tame frizzy hair and flyaways, transforming hair into silky smooth perfection. The nourishing blend contains coconut oil to help add luster, shine & softness to hair along with vanilla bean extract and essence of tiare - an infused perfume-oil made from soaking the petals in coconut oil. Plus, the coconut milk, tangerine and warm vanilla scent makes hair care an all-around sensory experience and leaves locks with an irresistibly good smell. Paraben-free and sulfated-surfactants free, this restorative coconut hair represents beauty, pure and simple.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABOUT OGX Hair has a life of its own, and OGX wants to make sure it’s a full life. Each innovative haircare formula is made with exotic ingredients to help hair shine, move, curl up, or hold tight, respectively — whatever sets its personality free. OGX is WHAT HAIR WANTS.

ABOUT OGX Hair has a life of its own, and OGX wants to make sure it’s a full life. Each innovative haircare formula is made with exotic ingredients to help hair shine, move, curl up, or hold tight, respectively — whatever sets its personality free. OGX is WHAT HAIR WANTS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo washes great and takes away greasiness, leaving your hair feeling soft after washing and drying. I don’t recommend using it every day as the tea tree will dry out your scalp. Try the matching conditioner also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly soothing to the scalp
reviews.reviewText: I've used tea tree shampoos for many years to treat my itchy scalp, but I've never used a shampoo that made my scalp feel incredibly soothed, like this one did after one application.I didn't even think it was possible for my scalp to feel so much better.I'm allergic to a lot of soaps, and there's clearly nothing at all that's bad for me in this. It doesn't smell like tea tree oil (which would be okay with me), but instead has a slightly odd perfume smell. I'm allergic to many scents, but not this. It's stronger than I like, but it wears off pretty quickly.If your scalp needs help, this is the shampoo you want. To the manufacturer, please please don't change the ingredients. It's too good for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice lather, and smell... Works well too....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent value. Does the job.
reviews.reviewText: It's not great, but not bad. I shave my head but use this on my full beard. It would be better if they found a way to make the shampoo a little more friendly for softening facial hair so I don't have to constantly buy conditioner, but that's the burden of having a beard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this shampoo. It has a nice light scent. My head doesn't itch after use. I wasn't sure about this product, but I will purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is GREAT STUFF!
reviews.reviewText: I had used the same shampoo for many years, and my partner told me he learned that the shampoo I was using dried out hair badly (and damaged it). He bought a bottle of this shampoo, and I (unwillingly) tried it.1. It actually feels good when you apply it.2. It gets the job done using much less shampoo.3. My hair is no longer as "dried out" as it used to be.Glaciers melt faster than I adapt to changes. OGX Hydrating + Tea Tree Mint Shampoo made a believer out of me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had sikewhat high expectations for this product. It did not provide that clean, tingle you get from brands like head & shoulders, Paul Mitchell, or generic brand. I will not be buying this again.
